TEXT.TITLE: BELDING HEMINWAY <BHY> OFFICIAL RESIGNS
TEXT.BODY: Belding Heminway Co Inc said Bruce Hausman has resigned as senior vice chairman and chairman of the executive committee to pursue personal interests in real estate and other investments but will remain on the board. Reuter
